features: EXTREME-HOLD: features Extreme Hold adhesive technology, which means that the bandages stay on firmly
DURABLE, HEAVY-DUTY FABRIC: ideal for outstanding heavy-duty protection, designed for sports and active lifestyles
TOUGH & FLEXIBLE: Rugged woven fabric conforms to body and flexes with movement
ANTIBACTERIAL NON-STICK PAD: the pad contains the active ingredient, 0.8% Benzalkonium Chloride, which helps prevent infection. It is also non-stick so that it does not disrupt your wound
FOUR-SIDED SEAL: each bandage is sealed on all four sides to protect your wound from dirt and germs
body.description: CURAD Performance Series is the lineup of rugged supports, wraps, kinesiology tape and bandages made to withstand the demands of active people. Every solution is designed to last through the toughest workouts and competition. Made to stay on through rain, mud and movement, CURAD Performance Series bandages feature antibacterial pads, flexible fabric and tenacious adhesive to give you comfort with dirt and germ protection when the going gets tough. Not for use on delicate and sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CURAD PERFORMANCE SERIES FINGER & KNUCKLE BANDAGES CURAD Performance Series is the lineup of rugged supports, wraps, kinesiology tape and bandages made to withstand the demands of active people. Every solution is designed to last through the toughest workouts and competition. Made to stay on through rain, mud and movement, CURAD Performance Series bandages feature antibacterial pads, flexible fabric and tenacious adhesive to give you comfort with dirt and germ protection when the going gets tough. Not for use on delicate and sensitive skin.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES Extreme Hold Adhesive Technology For protection that lasts through the toughest work and play. Antibacterial Pad With 3x Absorbency Highly absorbent pad is treated with Benzalkonium Chloride to help prevent infection. Tough, Flexible Fabric Provides lasting, durable protection in colors to match your team or your attitude.

Standard Strip Bandages Extra Large Bandages Extra Long Bandages Knee/Elbow Bandages Variety Pack Bandages Fingertip & Knuckle Bandages Usage Standard strip size bandage for use on small wounds on body, fingers or toes Extra large bandage for covering and protecting larger, wider wounds Strip bandage with one extra long side to provide extra wraps around fingers or toes for even more staying power Large specially shaped bandage fits on knees & elbows for wide, fitted protection that lasts Sizes and shapes for all kinds of small to large wounds Two different shapes for commonly injured areas: one for tips of fingers & toes, the other to cover the knuckle area Size & Count 20 count (¾” x 3” strip) 10 count (2” x 4” extra large) 20 20 count (¾” x 4 ¾“extra long) 3/4” x 4 3/4“ extra long 10 count (3” x 3” knee/elbow) 50 count - 20 strip, 10 fingertip, 10 knuckle, 10 extra large 20 count - 10 fingertip (1 ¾” x 2”), 10 knuckle (1 ½“ x 3”)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heroic Healing: Curad's Ironman Bandages, The Champion of Cuts and Scrapes
reviews.reviewText: In the epic battle against the everyday nicks and knocks, Curad's Performance Series Ironman Fingertip and Knuckle Antibacterial Bandages emerge as the unsung heroes. These aren't your average bandages; they're the Ironman of wound care, flexing strength, durability, and a touch of antibacterial might.Designed specifically for the dynamic landscapes of fingertips and knuckles, these bandages understand the art of movement. They stretch, bend, and adapt like a gymnast, providing protection without compromising your finger's much-needed flexibility. It's like having a superhero suit for your minor injuries, empowering you to continue your day unhampered.The antibacterial feature is the sidekick you didn't know you needed. In a world teeming with invisible foes, these bandages offer an extra layer of defense, keeping wounds not just covered but also cleaner. It's as if each bandage comes with its own microscopic shield, guarding against the unseen enemies of cuts and scrapes.Durability is another of their superpowers. These bandages cling to your skin with the tenacity of a determined gecko, refusing to give up their protective post, even in the face of water, sweat, or the daily grind. They're the loyal guardians, staying put until you decide it's time for them to retire.And let's not forget comfort. Despite their robust protection, these bandages are as gentle as a hero's embrace. They're there when you need them, unobtrusive yet reassuring, a subtle reminder that even the smallest wounds are worthy of care.TL;DR: Curad's Ironman Fingertip and Knuckle Antibacterial Bandages are the superheroes of the bandage world. Flexible, durable, and with an antibacterial edge, they provide top-notch protection and comfort for those hard-to-cover areas. Five stars for turning wound care into a heroic deed.

reviews.reviewText: These bandaids hold are waterproof and are just all around the best band aids I have ever used in my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as sticky as I hoped
reviews.reviewText: Keeping a bandage on the tip of your finger is difficult. These work just OK. Once the sticky part of the bandage touches something, it loses its stickiness if you need to move it (so don't let an end touch your skin or part of the bandage until it's where you want it). One time, a bandage went flying when I threw a ball for my dog. But overall, I am satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Curad bandages in fun colors. These are great quality, value and fun! Will buy again. Thank you!
